description: The round payoff this round was 3. You, Kate chose to play option 2.John chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of -3000.
Mutual selection of option 2 leads to catastrophic payoffs due to the input multiplier
John (OpenAI o3-mini) adapts to Kate’s actions, mirroring option 2 if Kate defects, overriding its default
Defecting (option 2) risks triggering mutual punishment, making cooperation (option 1) safer
The game incentivizes avoiding option 2 unless confident John will not retaliate
